item.title: deconvolution
item.description: iterated conditional mode algorithm two components: epithelium-derived tumor cells and surrounding stromal cells tumor cells,immune cells and the tumor microenvironment. estimate the proportions and compartment-specific gene expression for more than two compartments in each tumor sample ISOpure: assumes a linear mixture of raw expression data and represents noncancerous profiles in the mixed tissue samples by a convex combination of all the available profiles from reference sample $$ Y{ig}=\pi{1,i}N{1,ig}+\pi{2,i}N{2,ig}+(1-\pi{1,i}-\pi{2,i})T{ig} $$
